title: News
metaDescription: Latest news and updates from the Greater Fox Cities Bowling Association.

data.title: New Wisconsin State Hall of Famers!
data.author: GFCBA Staff
data.excerpt: Congrats to our association's own Pam Haertl, Rob Schuh, and Melissa Lang for their well-deserved induction into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame!
data.content: Congrats to our association's own Pam Haertl (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 1992), Rob Schuh (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 2015), and Melissa Lang for their well-deserved induction into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame! Read more about their accomplishments at https://wibowl.com/wisconsin-bowling-hall-of-fame-announces-2025-inductees/

data.title: 2025-2026 Association Tournament Schedule
data.author: GFCBA Staff
data.excerpt: Check out the complete schedule for all 2025-2026 association tournaments including Youth, Masters, Seniors, Open, and Women's tournaments.
data.content: The Greater Fox Cities Bowling Association is excited to announce the complete tournament schedule for the 2025-2026 season. Mark your calendars for these exciting competitive events! Youth Association Tournament: November 1-2, 8-9, 15-16, 2025 at Electric City Lanes in Kaukauna. Match Play (Masters): January 3, 2026. Match Play (Seniors): January 4, 2026. Open Association Tournament: January 10-11, 17-18, 2026 at Rolling Thunder Lanes in Neenah. Women's Association Tournament: January 10-11, 17-18, 2026 at Rolling Thunder Lanes in Neenah. We look forward to seeing you all compete!
